attributes.title: Why I gave it a 1 star review
attributes.review: America is the best country in the world and is great but it took 30 minutes to download this app and that is just un-American. We are the best so why does this app have such slow download speeds. It makes me think that there is something wrong and that it isn’t pro America. These downloads speeds are something that’d I’d expect in communist Sweden where the WiFi is probably just as bad as their stupid healthcare.

attributes.title: This app has too many flaws 😡
attributes.review: I was just another intellectual and got this app to help with my orange obsession but I have come to a sudden realization that this app can’t help with my orange urges this app is so bad that I don’t have the orange fetish anymore and it makes me quite sad I really miss the old days of worshiping the all mighty trump The app also crashed my phone 69 times and it didn’t work properly if it didn’t crash really bad app

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review:
I don’t like the app. 
Yesterday I downloaded it and it sent me a notification saying “ go back to your country” and I was so disappointed anyways I always hated trump never liked him😌🎭. But I mean I get why they call him Cheeto😹🍃man. You know sometimes I wonder why around his eyes it white but then his whole body is orange like did this man try and get a tan? Or did his try and leave him alone???🐍🌚🍤🤏🏼🤣🤣🤣😂. Anyways have fun growing ur small hot dog🌚🍤🤏🏼🐍✨🧚🏿🧚🏿✨🧚🏿💃🏽

attributes.title: bad bad app
attributes.review:
✨So of course when i saw this app, I knew I HAD to get it because I wanna support my orangey 🍊 president, yknow?  But when I opened the app, it was absolute GARBAGE 🤮.  Everything about it was terrible.  I cant believe they would let and app THIS BAD on the app-store.  The app was very laggy and badly set up and overall terrible.  Im very dissapointed in what I got because it is NOT what I was expecting 😔.  You can do better than this.✨

i'm from tiktok, the best app ever btw ❤️

attributes.title: extremely disappointed!
attributes.review: don't get me wrong, i LOVE trump but this app did NOT meet my expectations. the app continuously crashed and even made my phone screen turn black for other 30 minutes!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD this app. it is a waste of time. even biden could make a better app than this. also, there are too many unflattering pictures of trump included. i could barely keep my eyes open. apple needs to REMOVE this app

attributes.title: 😡🧚🏼‍♀️✨🧚🏼‍♀️🟠
attributes.review: This app is the worst, I don’t see the orange faces 🟠🟠🟠🟠🟠real opinions, I just see lies! I came to the app for the real facts, in the app it just starts to talk lies, this app shouldn’t be here, it also took like a month to download and I had so much space on my device! This app is the worse! 😡😡😡🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️✨✨

attributes.title: ✨worst app ever😔✨
attributes.review: um so I downloaded this app because I was feeling extra conservative today and I was like you know what, I might give this orange man a chance ☺️ However, once I downloaded the app I realized how brainwashed Trump supporters are and how racist their views are so I was like, “hm never mind🧚🏼‍♀️✨”. People should have their own opinions but when their opinions are biased and RACIST toward other fellow human beings, I just believe it shouldn’t be on an App Store that is inclusive to every one

attributes.title: Worst app they ever created smh☺️😌✨
attributes.review: DELETE THIS STUPID SHI🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊✨☺️anyways this is the worst, stupidest, dumbest, app they ever created. One I got this stupid app and I realized that my front camera was on so I thouhght it was a glitch so I went to this ✨stupid✨ app I I saw that it was recording me this whole 🍊time🍊anyways trump2020✨🧚but in jail periodt✨🧚‍♀️btw don’t ban TikTok☺️✨ if you been recording me this whole time just remember that this ✨stupid✨ app will be gone in anytime🍊🍊😂😂😭🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🍊✨🍊😂😭😂🍊🍊✨🤡😂🤡🍊😂🤡🍊🤡😂✨😭🤡🤡😂🤡🍊🍊🤡🤡✨😭

this app is horrible. i got it to see what was going on and it was alright i guess. then the next day i started to notice weird things yk, like the 🍊 was popping up at my house. bruh i’m scared, but anyways. and i think he hacked my phone bc the 🍊 is all over my fyp and my explore page. making me throw up🤢 i think he carries the virus, and is trying to give it to everyone. then on the app i saw so many racist things. DO NOT GET THIS APP. it’s horrible

This app does really give you updates in real time about what’s happening with the trump administration, love him or not it’s always nice to stay informed and understand what’s your elected officials are doing no matter what.
